insert into bfinance.zj_supplier(company_id, supplier_type, access_date, status, grade) values
(#{entity.companyId}, #{entity.supplierType}, #{entity.accessDate}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.grade})

insert into bfinance.zj_supplier(company_id, supplier_type, access_date, status, grade) values
(#{entity.companyId}, #{entity.supplierType}, #{entity.accessDate}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.grade})
on duplicate key update company_id = values(company_id) , supplier_type = values(supplier_type) , access_date = values(access_date) , status = values(status) , grade = values(grade)
